name: His Vulcan Mind
description: Leonard McCoy counts himself as Spock's friend, and has no reservations about how wrong-headed he feels the approach has been so far. Join McCoy in examining Spock's personal life and the humanity in his actions.
rules:
-- Unique Supply Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of T'Pring, McCoy, Chapel, Vulcans, or EV Suit Spock will provide a bonus to Supply Missions.
-- Every Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- Community Rewards are only available during Phase 1. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: T'Pring, McCoy, Chapel, Vulcans, or EV Suit Spock
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Supply Missions!

featured_crew.name: Leila
featured_crew.flavor: Leila fell in love with Spock, and was happy when mind-altering spores made him return her affection. It didn’t last.

featured_crew.name: McCoy
featured_crew.flavor: Donning an environmental suit and boarding the USS Defiant with his crewmates, McCoy seeks to find out what happened to its ill-fated crew.

goals.flavor: Seek fervor and faith with the Bajorans.

next_threshold_rewards.name: Chronitons
next_threshold_rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

screens.text: "Spock's out of his Vulcan mind, but he's not the only one. Logicians? Starfleet records? You trying to solve this in the slowest, most inefficient way possible?"
"Humans--clearly--have feelings. Spock is half-human. Humans do not behave logically. They act on their feelings. Therefore, Spock is having great feelings which are compelling him to act."
"I've always known Spock was a man of great passion. We just need to figure out who he cares about enough to want to erase his entire Starfleet career."
"This is no time to be coy, Nurse Chapel. Were you and Spock involved romantically, or not?"
"No, despite how much I wished it. Spock has passion, just... not for me."

responses.text: "We're not an inferior species. Feelings help as often as logic fails."
"So you're all certain Spock's actions are due to a romance?"
"You are Vulcan, and yet here we are."

screens.text: "I admit, it was the great feeling your James T. Kirk had for his friend that saw my wedding to a successful conclusion. Spock and I were a logical match... but not the right one."
"Please, Captain, no need to defend my honor. I've long come to terms with my unrealistic crush. I just want to help Spock."
"What makes us want to throw it all away? I've been all over this universe, and I've only ever found one answer: love. Whether it's soured or sweet, that's what's driving Spock."
